game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the legendary lost city of gold, El Dorado.
game.description: Rumors say that El Dorado is located deep in the Amazon Rainforest. Many have sought its treasure but none have returned. Will you be the one to uncover its secrets?
game.reward: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado and the respect of your fellow adventurers.
game.quest-giver: Old Man Jenkins, the local historian in the town square.

task.objective: Speak with Old Man Jenkins about the legend of El Dorado.
task.description: Find Old Man Jenkins in the town square and ask him about the lost city. He may give you some valuable clues or even a map.
